scripts.build:compose: echo "creating docker-compose.yml and .env examples..."  && sed /build/d docker-compose.yml > docker/docker-compose.yml && cp .env docker/.env && tar -czvf compose.tar.gz ./docker && git add compose.tar.gz && git commit -m 'build: create docker-compose.yml and .env templates' && yarn build
scripts.build: sudo cp -r db/backups docker/cssow-db/build && yarn --cwd src/student_web build && yarn --cwd src/markdown-service build && yarn --cwd src/teacher_web build
scripts.test: yarn --cwd src/teacher_web/ test && yarn --cwd src/student_web/ test && yarn --cwd src/teacher_web/ test-api && yarn --cwd src/teacher_web/ test-ui
